name: Concerto for Cells and String
description:
Welcome to my first exhibition of procedural art.

Please enjoy looking through the paintings and feel free to assemble them into compositions of your own.

PROCJAM 2018 Submission

CONTROLS

LMB – skip text, drag & drop paintings, press "Refresh" button
ESC – quit game

CREDITS

Made by @LOWPOLIS
UI by @rayzones
Graphics, Programming, Music, SFX by @yafffle
